attributes.action: remove troops from iraq, not go to war against iran and distance the UK from USA foreign policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a worsening state in the Middle East ans 90% of the violence is against US/UK forces. So we request that all UK troops are brought home. War against Iran will never happen whilst the UN can oversee the nuclear energy in Iran. Also to pubically distance UK from USA whilst Guantanemo Bay is operational

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this theme already...
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
